item.description:
Let's go racing at the indoor track at F1 Boston in Braintree.
www.f1boston.com

This time around on a Saturday.  We'll try to race on Track 2

Just arrive and drive. Racing suits, helmets and neck braces are provided by F1 Boston. No prior experience required. It's a blast if you are a first timer or a regular.

Let's hit the tracks.

 

Here's a coupon for you to get 50% off your race package when you come for this event - http://www.push44.com/fzxma9yx - Print it out and bring it along.

The 50% off includes the day license + one race. The coupon expires 3/21/2011.

Good luck on the track.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet by the registration desk
item.name: Indoor racing @ F1 Boston
